name: jpmocktest.github.io
short_description: Static HTML mock-test site. Tests under `tests/`, per-test data in `*-data.js`.
minimal_parse_steps: 1. Read this JSON for entry points and image pattern.
2. For each test folder, load its index.html and the sibling *-data.js.
3. If *-data.js is empty, check plaintext sources at repo root and .bak files.
4. Map plaintext markers like 'Image Q1A' -> image file using image_pattern.
5. Note: Image paths use spaces in folder names (e.g., 'jft basic test 1' not 'jft-basic-1')
6. Respect backups; do not overwrite without saving a .bak first.
notes: Importer script at scripts/import-questions.ps1; when importing, tool will create a backup (*.bak). Data file variable names are converted to camelCase and assigned to window.testData. All *-data.js files include initialization code at the end to set window.testData and enable test access after password entry. Images migrated to root /images/ directory (not /data/images/). All JFT Basic test files regenerated with proper UTF-8 encoding from source text files.
